title: WordPress Fullstack Developer (App Developer)
bullets: Headless Wordpress as database with Next.js Frontend/Backend using API Requests (REST API)
JWT Authentication Tested and working (No Express.js Proxy Shortcut needed!)
Completely Migratable, Reuseable, with Local JSON Data as Fallback Source
Decoupled Database from Backend and DOM, Can Mirror Data into React Native App

title: Frontend Developer (Web Designer)

title: Graphic Designer (UI/UX Designer)
